name: Wildebeest Revenge
description:
International AzPlay 2015 competition finalist in "Best Sound" category

Valentine's Day Editon. Send bestial love postcards!!

"Wildebeest Revenge" it's a casual game that combines skill, strategy and action set in the Serengeti. Starring Mr. Niu, a charismatic wildebeest that decides to leave the pack and fight, tired of his kind serving up for hyena and crocodile snack on their annual migration through the Serengeti.

The game mechanics are a mix of Space Invaders with Pachinko causing a direct and uncomplicated gameplay. Moving left, right and shoot will be enough commands to dive into the adventure. "Wildebeest Revenge" is composed of two danger­filled worlds with16levels eachandafinal showdownwherewewill findour real enemy, the hunter and tyrant "Real Hunter" and his seductive buddy in an uneven battle.

Website: http://gotostudio.es/

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wildebeestrevenge/
